extendedInfo.description: A classic role playing game on your home screen! RPG Live Wallpaper is a homage to classic RPGs I loved in my youth - Final Fantasy and Dragon Warrior (now known as Dragon Quest.)In those great games you had a character that wandered through forests, mountains, deserts, and dungeons to complete an epic quest - all while facing monsters every step of the way.I wanted to capture that feel in a live wallpaper.In this RPG, your character wanders over an infinite world battling monsters and leveling up along the way. As he gains levels, he'll encounter new monsters. Each new encounter creates an entry in the bestiary (visible on the settings screen.)Direct your hero around the map by touching the screen. If left alone, he'll wander about on his own.If your hero reaches the maximum level, he'll start back over at 1 but the bestiary entries will remain.SHORT HISTORY EXPOSITION:When I was little, after constant badgering, my dad drove me 40 minutes to pick up Dragon Warrior for my NES. I remember him cautioning me on the way home, "You'd better not finish this game in one day..." The game was expensive, certainly, and I'd usually finish them quickly and toss them aside. This was different. It had substance.Since I played it for weeks on end, I had a less difficult time convincing him to buy my second love: Final Fantasy.FUTURE DEVELOPMENT:If you enjoy this, get the full version! I'd love to expand the world with more characters, shops, dungeons, and interaction.Thanks and enjoy!Special thanks to Toriaka for the monster and background illustrations.

reviews.title: Installed on...
reviews.comment: ...a new phone and OS. Doesn\'t work like it used too. Would love to see an update to support Jellybean. It won\'t even load. Won\'t purchase full version until it is fully supported.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good push
reviews.comment: Great job guy, i like it. Still missing some elements. You\'ve of course are aware as you\'ve made note of those already. To everyone cussing and bitching so vehemently: shut up or go make your own live rpg wallpaper. You have no room to complain unless you can do better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nostalgic
reviews.comment: Awesome! So glad the bugs are fixed and that I didn\'t delete it. :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Old-school rpg goodness!
reviews.comment: This wallpaper is great! Reminds me of my 8-bit and 16-bit rpg gaming days. Love it!
reviews.author: Benjamin Wright

reviews.title: Live wallpaper people.
reviews.comment: Comment below mine.. What does he expect from a live wallpaper game? This does exactly what it should. Wallpaper games aren\'t as detailed as a regular game or it would run down ur battery. Keep up the awesome job Dev  with these live wallpapers! Thumbs up! \342\231\245\342\230\205\342\231\245\342\230\205\342\231\245 \330\252
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome initiative.
reviews.comment: The guy moonwalks a lot and walks around so erratically it\'s distracting. He should just walk in a straight line and only turn occasionally, as if he were going somewhere.
reviews.author: Enrique Velez

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: You should make a game on this wall paper but with towns and maps and different terrains And people And like forests
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Grr
reviews.comment: Even for a beta (free version) I still dislike it. I see nothing of interest, no towns, stats, people, equipment, or landmarks... just me and random terrain. And the occational monsters. And I randomly go from level one to level 3 and vice versa, no level 100? 50? Seriously...

reviews.comment: It is just badass and it does every thing its suppose to do

reviews.title: Love it

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: This is a great live wallpaper that does exactly as promised. With it constantly running I was afraid that it would drain my battery, but it seems to have no effect at all.

reviews.title: Only one thing that bugs me...
reviews.comment: The character\'s walking animation is up, down, left, right, while the scenery scrolls on diagonals... Also, sometimes, the animation and the scrolling are completely backwards.

reviews.comment: dammit! hate to give it such a low rating because of its ambitious goals, but it wont run at all on my android phone :\'(  *le weep!
